content: When looking at performance versus pre-COVID 2019, total net revenue experienced 36% organic growth on a pro forma basis with the bike business up 25%, reflecting increased demand across our categories and as a step function in online penetration. I would like to highlight the active customers net orders and net AOV grew strongly versus pre-COVID, indicating SSU’s ability to effectively take advantage of the underlying megatrends with active customers increasing 35%, net orders 25%, and net AOV by 5% versus Q2 fiscal year 2019.
